A good 700 mb rip of this DVD with all subs can be found here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4933291/Valkyrie_%282008%29_DVDrip_Tom_Cruise_%28Optional_subs_NORDIC_Eng%29

Thank You for sharing!

Audio is not dts, it is AC3/6 EN (Dolby Surround).
2 audio tracks: English and English descriptive for blind people.
If you strip the descriptive audio track & the Blu-ray commercials & the FBI Warnings & two of the subtitles, then it will fit on a DVD5 without transcoding the video. ;-)
Great Moovie, too bad about that god damned huge wooden TABLE or the fucker would have been killed
